hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:Husain bin ‘Awf told me: I said: “O Messenger of Allah, the command for Hajj has come but my father cannot perform Hajj unless he is tied to a saddle.” Some time passed, then he said: “Perform Hajj on behalf of your father.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَجِّ عَنِ الْحَىِّ، إِذَا لَمْ يَسْتَطِعْ
chapter.eng-name: Performing Hajj on behalf of a living person if he is incapable himself
